TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Immigration threshold increased by %d1%% [NEWLINE]due to many immigrants waiting on dock[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]City Happiness[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]The citizens are [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]happy[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Effects :[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Immigration from Europe increases[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The population grows faster[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Learning by Doing is faster[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Slaves and Criminals become free faster[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Slaves and Criminals run away less often[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Slaves and Criminals revolt less often[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Domestic Market profits increase[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Entertainment profits increase[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]High Happiness can cause [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Festivities[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bonheur de la ville[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Les citoyens sont [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]heureux[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Les effets :[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]L'immigration venant d'Europe augmente[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]La population croît plus vite[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]L'apprentissage sur le tas est plus rapide[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Les esclaves et les forçats s'émancipent plus vite[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Les esclaves et les forçats s'enfuient moins souvent[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Les esclaves et les forçats se révoltent moins souvent[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Les profits sur le marché local croissent[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Les profits de divertissement croissent[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Le bonheur élevé peut entrainer des [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Célébrations[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zufriedenheit[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Die Stadtbewohner sind [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]glücklich[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Effekte :[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Auswanderung aus Europa erhöht[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Bevölkerung wächst schneller[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Erlernen eines Berufes durch Ausübung beschleunigt[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Sklaven und Kriminelle werden schneller freie Siedler[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Sklaven und Kriminelle flüchten weniger oft[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Sklaven und Kriminelle revoltieren weniger oft[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Höhere Profite durch heimischen Markt[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Höhere Profite durch Unterhaltung[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Hohe Zufriedenheit kann zu Feierlichkeiten führen
TEXT.Russian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Городское счастье[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Горожане [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]счастливы[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Эффекты :[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]увеличивается иммиграция из Европы[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]население увеличивается быстрее[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]обучение профессии на практике происходит быстрее[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]рабы и преступники могут получить свободу быстрее[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]рабы и преступники реже убегают[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]рабы и преступники реже бунтуют[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]увеличивается прибыль на Внутреннем рынке[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]увеличивается прибыль от развлечений[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]высокий уровень счастья способствует проведению [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]празднеств[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.French: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]%s1_city_name : [COLOR_REVERT]Le niveau de mécontentement élevé a entrainé des émeutes.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]%s1_city_name : [COLOR_REVERT]Die hohe Unzufriedenheit in der Stadt hat zu Unruhen geführt.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%s1_city_name : [COLOR_REVERT]The high Happiness has led to festivities that generated %d2 [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s3_father_points[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%s1_city_name : [COLOR_REVERT]Le niveau de bonheur élevé a été célébré, et nous en avons reçu %d2 [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s3_father_points[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%s1_city_name : [COLOR_REVERT]Die hohe Zufriedenheit in der Stadt hat zu Feierlichkeiten geführt, die %d2 [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s3_father_points[COLOR_REVERT] erzeugt haben.
TEXT.Russian: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%s1_city_name : [COLOR_REVERT]Высокое счастье привело к празднествам, которые принесли %d2 [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s3_father_points[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]%s1_city_name : [COLOR_REVERT]The high crime in the city has caused unrest.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]%s1_city_name : [COLOR_REVERT]Le taux de crime élevé a entrainé des émeutes.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]%s1_city_name : [COLOR_REVERT]Die hohe Kriminalität in der Stadt hat zu Unruhen geführt.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]%s1_city_name : [COLOR_REVERT]The high crime in the city has led to gold being stolen.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]%s1_city_name : [COLOR_REVERT]Le taux de crime élevé a entrainé le vol d'argent dans vos coffres.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]%s1_city_name : [COLOR_REVERT]Die hohe Kriminalität in der Stadt hat dazu geführt, dass Gold gestohlen wurde.
TEXT.Russian: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]%s1_city_name : [COLOR_REVERT]Высокий уровень преступности в городе привел к краже золота.

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1%% %F2_Icon en moins à cause des esclaves dans les villes.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%s1_city_name : [COLOR_REVERT]The high happiness has caused increased domestic demand and prices.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%s1_city_name : [COLOR_REVERT]Le niveau de bonheur élevé a provoqué la hausse des prix et de la demande du marché local.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%s1_city_name : [COLOR_REVERT]Die hohe Zufriedenheit hat zu erhöhten Preisen und starker Nachfrage geführt.
TEXT.Russian: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%s1_city_name : [COLOR_REVERT]Высокий уровень счастья вызвал увеличение внутреннего спроса и цен.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]%s1_city_name : [COLOR_REVERT]The high unhappiness has caused decreased domestic demand and prices.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]%s1_city_name : [COLOR_REVERT]Le niveau de mécontentement élevé a provoqué la baisse des prix et de la demande du marché local.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]%s1_city_name : [COLOR_REVERT]Die hohe Unzufriedenheit hat zu reduzierten Preisen und geringer Nachfrage geführt.
TEXT.Russian: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]%s1_city_name : [COLOR_REVERT]Из-за недовольства снизился внутренний спрос и цены.
